question: List the three longest-running shows and their duration.
sql_query1: SELECT title, Number_of_seasons FROM Show ORDER BY Number_of_seasons DESC LIMIT 3;
sql_query2: SELECT title, Number_of_episodes FROM Show ORDER BY Number_of_episodes DESC LIMIT 3;
sql_query3: SELECT title, Number_of_seasons, Number_of_episodes FROM Show ORDER BY Number_of_seasons, Number_of_episodes DESC LIMIT 3;
interpretation1: List the three longest-running shows and number of their seasons.
interpretation2: List the three longest-running shows and number of their episodes.
interpretation3: List the three longest-running shows and number of their seasons and episodes.
sql_query_general: SELECT title, Length FROM Show ORDER BY Length DESC LIMIT 3;

question: What are the titles, durations and release years of all comedy shows?
sql_query1: SELECT title, Number_of_seasons, release_year FROM Show WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
sql_query2: SELECT title, Number_of_episodes, release_year FROM Show WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
sql_query3: SELECT title, Number_of_seasons, Number_of_episodes, release_year FROM Show WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
interpretation1: Give me the title, number of seasons and release year of all comedy shows
interpretation2: Give me the title, number of episodes and release year of all comedy shows
interpretation3: Give me the title, number of seasons and episodes, and release year of all comedy shows
sql_query_general: SELECT title, Length, release_year FROM Show WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
